text: Arhopala moolaiana or pale yellow oakblue, is a butterfly in the family Lycaenidae. It was described by Frederic Moore in 1879. It is found in the Indomalayan realm.Seitz, A., 1912-1927. Die Indo-Australien Tagfalter Grossschmetterlinge Erde 9 ==Subspecies== *A. m. moolaiana Burma (Tavoy, Tenasserim, Ataran, Karen Hills) *A. m. maya (Evans, 1932) Mergui, Thailand *A. m. yajuna Corbet, 1941 Sumatra, Peninsular Malaya, Borneo *A. m. klossi Corbet, 1941 Siberut, Sipora, Pagi ==References== ==External links== *Arhopala Boisduval, 1832 at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms. Retrieved June 3, 2017. Category:Arhopala Category:Butterflies described in 1879
title: Arhopala moolaiana
